mapper.select: select memOrg.LAST_ORG_CODE ,memOrg.LAST_GRP_CODE , memOrg.LAST_DEPT_CODE, ' ' AS REJOIN_TARGET_PERCENT ,COUNT(PeriodExp.SRV_PRD_ID) AS TOTAL_EXPIRED, (count(svm.SRV_MEM_ID) + COUNT(svc.SRV_CNTRCT_ID)) AS TOTAL_SVM,COUNT(som.SALES_ORD_ID) AS TOTAL_EXTRADE, (count(svm.SRV_MEM_ID) + COUNT(som.SALES_ORD_ID)) AS TOTAL_REJOIN,' ' REJOIN_PERCENT from SVC0008D sch left join SVC0009D config on config.SALES_ORD_ID = sch.SALES_ORD_ID left join SAL0088D cfgPeriod on cfgPeriod.SRV_CONFIG_ID = config.ID left join SAL0088D PeriodExp on PeriodExp.SRV_PRD_ID = cfgPeriod.SRV_PRD_ID AND TO_CHAR(PeriodExp.SRV_PRD_EXPR_DT,'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM') AND TO_CHAR(PeriodExp.SRV_PRD_EXPR_DT,'YYYY')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') left join SAL0095D svm on svm.SRV_SALES_ORD_ID = config.SALES_ORD_ID and svm.SRV_MEM_PAC_ID NOT IN (2,3,4) AND svm.SRV_STUS_CODE_ID = 4 left join SAL0077D svc on svc.SRV_CNTRCT_ORD_ID = config.SALES_ORD_ID AND SRV_CNTRCT_STUS_ID = 4 join ORG0005D memOrg on memOrg.MEM_ID = sch.CODY_ID AND memOrg.ORG_STUS_CODE_ID = 1 and memOrg.LAST_DEPT_CODE <> ' ' left join SAL0001D som on som.SALES_ORD_ID = sch.SALES_ORD_ID and (som.BINDING_NO IS NOT NULL OR som.BINDING_NO <> ' ') AND SALES_ORD_ID_OLD > 0 where sch.MONTH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM') AND sch.YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') GROUP BY memOrg.LAST_ORG_CODE ,memOrg.LAST_GRP_CODE , memOrg.LAST_DEPT_CODE

select memOrg.LAST_ORG_CODE ,memOrg.LAST_GRP_CODE , memOrg.LAST_DEPT_CODE, ' ' AS collection_target_percent , count(accDept.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID) AS NO_OF_ACCT, SUM(accDept_sub.ACC_DEBT_SUB_OPNG_COLCT_TRGET) TARGET,SUM(accDept_sub.ACC_DEBT_CURR_TOT_COLCT ) as COLLECTION ,(case WHEN (SUM(accDept_sub.ACC_DEBT_SUB_OPNG_COLCT_TRGET) >0) then (SUM(accDept_sub.ACC_DEBT_CURR_TOT_COLCT )/SUM(accDept_sub.ACC_DEBT_SUB_OPNG_COLCT_TRGET)*100) ELSE 0 END) AS COLLECTION_PERCENT ,(CASE WHEN count(PD1.PAY_ITM_ID) >0 THEN (count(PD.PAY_ITM_ID)/count(PD1.PAY_ITM_ID) * 100) ELSE 0 END) ADD_PERCENT from PAY0052S accDept join PAY0053S accDept_sub on accDept_sub.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID = accDept.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID join SVC0008D sch on sch.SALES_ORD_ID =accDept.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID --sch.SCHDUL_ID = accDept.ACC_DEBT_ORD_BS_SCHDUL_ID join ORG0005D memOrg on memOrg.MEM_ID = sch.CODY_ID AND memOrg.ORG_STUS_CODE_ID = 1 and memOrg.LAST_DEPT_CODE <> ' ' left join PAY0064D PM on PM.SALES_ORD_ID = accDept.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID left join PAY0065D PD on PD.PAY_ID = PM.PAY_ID AND PD.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID IN (106,107,108) left join PAY0065D PD1 ON PD1.PAY_ID = PM.PAY_ID group by memOrg.LAST_ORG_CODE ,memOrg.LAST_GRP_CODE , memOrg.LAST_DEPT_CODE

select f.mem_code as "SCM", d.mem_code as "CM", (case when b.mem_lvl = 4 then c.mem_code else null end ) as "CODY", Count(a.schdul_id) as "No of Acct" , Count(case when a.stus_code_id = 1 then 1 else null end ) as "Active" , Count(case when a.stus_code_id = 4 then 1 else null end ) as "Complete" , count(case when a.stus_code_id =21 then 1 else null end ) as "Fail" , count(case when a.stus_code_id =10 then 1 else null end ) as "Cancel", count(case when a.stus_code_id not in (1,4, 21,10) then 1 else null end ) as "Other", /*22-High Outstanding,8-Inactive,0*/ round((Count(case when a.stus_code_id = 4 then 1 else null end )/ (Count(case when a.stus_code_id = 1 then 1 else null end ) + Count(case when a.stus_code_id = 4 then 1 else null end ) + count(case when a.stus_code_id =21 then 1 else null end ) )*100) ,0)as "Complete%" from svc0008D a join org0005d b on b.mem_id = a.cody_id join org0001D c on b.mem_id = c.mem_id join org0001D d on d.mem_id = b.mem_up_ID join org0005d e on e.mem_id = d.mem_id join org0001D f on f.mem_id = e.mem_up_ID where a.year = TO_CHAR(to_date(#{myBSMonth} ,'MM/YYYY'),'YYYY') and a.month = TO_CHAR(to_date(#{myBSMonth},'MM/YYYY'),'MM') group by b.mem_lvl,c.mem_code,d.mem_code, f.mem_code
